course_description: Students who perform in a Theater Emory production may opt to receive 2 credits upon completion of an evaluation form that reflects on the experience. (Shorter-term projects: 1 credit.) Performance laboratories attached to literature courses are also 320R.
sections: Class Nbr: 6357, Section #: 3, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. Fort, Status: Open
